description: This is a collection of mistakes based on a summary of your previous practice.

ListeningQuestion.solution: He knew that trying to fix the broken clock without the right tools was futile.
ListeningQuestion.analysis: He knew that <f:t><i:r><x:y>ing t[o][ ][f][i]<h:x><a: >t[h][e] broken clock withou[t][ ]t[h][e] right tools was futile.

ListeningQuestion.solution: We are planning a gathering with close friends to celebrate the holiday season.
ListeningQuestion.analysis: We are <g:p><o:l><i:a>n(g)( )(t)(o)< :n><s:i><e:n><t:g> a gathering with close friends to celebrate the holiday season.

ListeningQuestion.solution: We noticed a discrepancy in the meeting times listed on the two agendas.
ListeningQuestion.analysis: We noticed (t)(h)<e:a> discrepancy in the meeting time[s] listed <i:o>n[ ][t][h][e] two agendas.

ListeningQuestion.solution: Aeration of your garden soil can lead to healthier plants and better yields.
Teachers often liaise with parents to discuss students' progress.

SentenceMakingQuestion.content: You have a backyard garden, and you've noticed that your plants aren't growing as well as they should. Discuss how you might improve the soil conditions to promote healthier plant growth.
SentenceMakingQuestion.solution: I decided to focus on the aeration of the garden soil to enhance drainage and ensure the roots have enough oxygen for better growth.

SentenceMakingQuestion.content: Imagine you are trying to grow a plant in a location that does not receive adequate sunlight or nutrients. Explain why continuing to water it might not lead to the desired growth.
SentenceMakingQuestion.solution: It is futile to continue watering the plant because without enough sunlight or nutrients, it will not grow properly.

SentenceMakingQuestion.content: Think about a weekend when your family members come together for a barbecue, and another situation where you are required to collect materials for a school project. Use the word 'gathering' in sentences for both situations.
SentenceMakingQuestion.solution: The family gathering at the park was filled with laughter and delicious food. The gathering of materials for the school project took longer than expected.

SentenceMakingQuestion.content: You are visiting a local pond with a friend, and you notice something green covering the surface of the water. Explain what you see.
SentenceMakingQuestion.solution: The surface of the pond was covered with green algae, giving it a slightly murky appearance.

SentenceMakingQuestion.content: You have been assigned as the leader of a project team at work. Explain how you would manage the communication between your team and other departments involved in the project.
SentenceMakingQuestion.solution: I will liaise with the other department heads to ensure that all aspects of the project are aligned and progressing smoothly.

SentenceMakingQuestion.content: You are reviewing the monthly sales figures for your company and notice that the numbers in two different reports don't match. Describe what you found.
SentenceMakingQuestion.solution: There was a discrepancy between the sales figures reported by the accounting department and those recorded in the sales department's report.
